divs: Sighting DetailsWas at Lake Las Vegas watching a band and had the felling I watch being watched, I looked up and saw a very bright light moving fast from the North West. I told my wife to look up and it had stopped and was very dim, I had my wife look at the Two bright stars and told her to watch the dim one in the middle, it started to glow bright then went east Vary fast and disappeared. I see them quite often it���s fun to see were not alone. This the third one my wife had seen
